data.description:
Welcome to LifeSaVR, the comprehensive app that trains you in he use of a Naloxone kit to intervene in case of opioid overdose.

The opioid crisis is a major public health issue in many countries. Thousands of people die each year from opioid overdoses. In response to this crisis, it is essential to be prepared to intervene quickly in case of overdose to save lives.

LifeSaVR is a three-part application that allows you to become more aware of the opioid crisis, learn about a Naloxone kit in detail, and simulate a complete intervention in case of opioid overdose.

In the first part, you will learn more about the opioid crisis, its causes, and its consequences. You will have access to statistics, graphs, and testimonials from people affected by this crisis. This section aims to raise awareness among users of the seriousness of the situation and encourage them to prepare to intervene if necessary.

In the second part, you will discover the different elements that make up a Naloxone kit. You will learn how to use them correctly. This section is essential to be prepared to intervene quickly in case of overdose.

Finally, in the third part, you can put your knowledge into practice by simulating a complete intervention in case of opioid overdose. You will be immersed in a virtual situation where you will have to make the right decisions to intervene quickly and effectively. This simulation is a safe and practical way to prepare for a real emergency situation.
